keyPolicies.policyDescription: Weaken the old political elites, strengthen the power of the people, fix our broken politics and restore people's faith that if we act together things can change. A serious agenda for new politics.

Gordon Brown's debt, waste and taxes are holding us back, threatening the recovery with higher interest rates. A Conservative Government will act now to reduce debt, get the economy moving so mortgage rates stay lower for longer.

Since 1997, Labour's open-door immigration policy has seen the largest and most sustained rise in immigration in our history. A Conservative government will reduce immigration and promote integration into British society.

issues.economy: Gordon Brown's debt, waste and taxes are threatening the recovery with higher interest rates. A Conservative Government will act now to reduce debt, get the economy moving so mortgage rates stay lower for longer.
